snippet.title: Theres nothing quite like reaping the harvest

snippet.title: The garden is almost completely planted...
snippet.description: still battling the gloom and rain. And having trouble finding the sweet corn seed I want. I should have ordered some, but after the durn house got hit I left everything in limbo....
